articles.title: NASA experts wanted India to share space technology: ISRO chief Somanath - Mint
articles.description: Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) chairman S Somanath Sunday said NASA-JPL experts wanted India to share its space technology with the US after witnessing the developmental activities of the Chandrayaan-3 spacecraft.
